backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user management with 8 roles (superadmin, admin, finance, concierge, strategicPartner, asistenmu, client, partner), user approval workflow, access control integration, and admin functions for managing pending/active user statuses.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining user types (Role, Status, User) and a no-op migration function that preserves the existing users Map during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 17 frontend files covering styling, routing, authentication, registration, approval workflows, admin dashboard, and user profile components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, and charts.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication flow, superadmin claim routing, user registration, and approval status checks with TanStack Router and loading states.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard displaying pending user registrations with approve/reject actions, stats cards, legacy approvals table, and toast notifications for user management operations.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalStatusBa: Banner component showing user approval status (approved or pending) with appropriate icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/ApprovedUserView: Router component that renders AdminDashboard for admins, PendingApprovalView for unapproved users, or a placeholder dashboard with profile link for approved non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component displaying hero section, feature cards (multi-role system, secure access, approval workflow), header with logo and login button, and footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Reusable login/logout button component with two variants (default and hero) that handles Internet Identity authentication and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/PendingApprovalV: View shown to users whose registration is pending admin approval, displaying their name and requested role with a waiting status message.
frontend/src/components/RegistrationFlow: Multi-step registration form allowing new users to enter their name and select a role from 7 available options, showing success state after submission.
frontend/src/components/SuperadminClaimP: Special page allowing the first authenticated user to claim superadmin privileges with a one-time action button and success redirect.
frontend/src/components/UserInfoPage.tsx: User profile page displaying authenticated user's name, role, status, and registration timestamp with formatted role names and dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApprovalManagement: Provides React Query hooks for managing user approvals including listing approvals, approving/rejecting users, and setting approval status with role assignment.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login/logout functionality, identity management, and session state tracking using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching user data including caller profile, role, approval status, current user info, and pending registration requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegistration.ts: Provides a mutation hook for user self-registration that maps frontend role selections (client, partner, internal roles) to backend registration functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuperadminClaim.ts: Implements hooks to check if a superadmin exists and claim superadmin privileges, with query invalidation on successful claim.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes using an emerald/teal professional color scheme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider wrapping the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color system using OKLCH, container settings, extended theme properties, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking user management system with self-registration for clients, partners, and internal staff roles. Contains 8 feature requests (AR-1 to AR-8) to unlock getCallerUserProfile and add self-registration functions with pending status approval workflow.
